cardStatus.activateTitle: Your card is on the way!
cardStatus.activateDescription: Good news, Mathew! Your credit card is in the process of being shipped and will arrive at your destination within 5 business days.
cardStatus.activationStartDescription: It should be with you by
cardStatus.activationCodeDescription: Enter the last 4 digits of the number on your credit card.
cardStatus.createPinDescription: Assign a key of 4 digits to your card for ATM withdrawals.
cardStatus.success: The card has been successfully activated
